decimal_weekly: ${name} takes care of ${count} dogs. Each dog takes ${rate_decimal} hours a day to walk and care for. How many hours a week does ${subject} spend taking care of dogs?
${name} has ${count} plants. Each plant needs ${rate_decimal} cups of water per day. How many cups of water does ${subject} use in a week?
${name} walks ${count} dogs every day. Each walk takes ${rate_decimal} hours. How many hours does ${subject} spend walking dogs each week?
A teacher grades ${count} papers. Each paper takes ${rate_decimal} hours to grade. If the teacher works ${days} days a week, how many hours total does grading take?
${name} exercises ${count} times a day, with each session lasting ${rate_decimal} hours. How many hours does ${subject} exercise in ${days} days?
simple_rate: ${name} can complete ${count} tasks per hour. Working for ${rate_decimal} hours, how many tasks can ${subject} complete?
A machine produces ${count} items per minute. How many items does it produce in ${rate_decimal} minutes?
